title: Oka Romantic Crime Katha
plot: _Oka Romantic Crime Katha_ (qv) is a story of three girls Thanmai, Anju and Swapna, who happened to be friends in a bus stop , their common meeting point. synopsis:
Thanmai, Anju and Swapna are three friends who commute from the same bus stop.
Thanmai, youngest of the trio belongs to a middle class family. Her father's meager earnings are not sufficient to full fill her dreams.
She falls in love with an orphan who is pursuing his engineering course. He starts petty crimes to earn money in order to lead a luxurious life.Anju belongs to a rich family whose parents are busy earning money. They have little time for their daughter. She is desperate to be loved and changes many partners in pursuit of true love. She is used by men for their pleasure.She realizes that she became pregnant and wanted to get rid of it. Since she is a minor doctor's refuse to conduct abortion. A broker steps in and offers his help to terminate the pregnancy by a quack.
The trio had to arrange money for the procedure.
Thanmai asks her boyfriend to help. He arranges the money by a chain snatching.
After completion of the abortion she wishes to meet her boyfriend in their usual meeting point.
While he was waiting for her to come he finds a lonely woman with ornaments on her. He tries to steal from her but she protests. He kills her in the scuffle.
Thanmai reaches there and to her horror finds her boyfriend killing a hapless woman. After much deliberations and moral dilemmas, they both decide to continue crimes to fulfill their dreams.
Swapna is trapped by her classmate in the name of love and he blackmails her that he would upload their intimate videos in social media. She commits suicide in a desperate situation.
The same guy films the intimate moments of Thanmai and her boyfriend and blackmails them that he would expose them. In a desperation to resolve the situation they kill him in cold blood.
As no crime can be concealed for long, even their crime gets exposed. They were arrested by police. There is a huge uproar in the society to eliminate them.
Police out of public pressure shoots them in a fake encounter.The film gained attention due to the unique promotion by the makers. It became a box office success and several films were made on the similar genre.A sequel to the film Oka criminal prema katha released in 2014 and the third edition of the series Romantic Criminals was released in the year 2019.
